alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:30AM CST until January 31 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River at Riverside affecting San Jacinto, Walker, Polk and Trinity Counties. For the Trinity River...including Crockett, Riverside, Romayor, Goodrich, Liberty, Moss Bluff...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Riverside. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 134.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding continues with the boat ramp in the Deep River Plantation Subdivision in Walker County inundated. Backwater flooding up Thomas Lake in Walker County floods the boat ramp in the Green Rich Shores Subdivision in Walker County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Monday the stage was 134.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 132.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CST Monday was 135.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 132.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 133.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 134.4 feet on 04/13/2007. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Trinity River Riverside 133.5 134.4 Mon 8 am CST 133.6 133.1 132.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.late tonight at 330 AM CST.
